Pre-Game Insights: The Boston Red Sox will try to stop a six-game road slide when they play the New York Yankees.
The matchup Friday is the 11th time these teams square off this season. The season series is tied 5-5.
Aaron Judge has 33 doubles, a triple, 51 home runs and 126 RBI for the Yankees.
Juan Soto is 9-for-35 with a double, two home runs and five RBI over the last 10 games.
Tyler O'Neill leads the Red Sox with 30 home runs while slugging .547.
Connor Wong is 10-for-35 with five doubles, a home run and two RBI over the past 10 games.
Yankees: 6-4, .227 batting average, 3.00 ERA, outscored opponents by four runs in the last 10 games.
Red Sox: 4-6, .239 batting average, 4.19 ERA, outscored by six runs in the last 10 games.
